1. 'Gladiator II' director Ridley Scott backtracks on AI after calling it a 'technical hydrogen bomb'  Fox News

  3. Ridley Scott Says “​​Gladiator II” Is Just ‘as Good’ as Oscar-Winning Original (Exclusive)  Yahoo Entertainment

  5. Will ‘Gladiator II’ herald the comeback of sword-and-sandal epics?  The Hindu
